name: Space Shooter (itch) (SkyBerron)
description:
Destroy the alien space ships.

A game in 553 characters of code for TweetTweetJam 5

This game was made for #TweetTweetJam and contains only 553 characters of code, including art. The code is below:

_set_fps(60)f,m,h,g=128,64,0,mid::s::x,y,w,z,s,t,p=m,96,0,0,0,.3,{}for i=1,999do p[i]={a=rnd(),y=-i*32}end::_::cls()b=btn()t+=.0001 x+=(b&2)-2*(b&1)y+=(b&8)/4-(b&4)/2x,y=g(3,x,124),g(2,y,125)if z>-6 then z-=3 else if(btnp(4))w,z=x,y end h=max(s,h)for i=1,999do q=p[i]q.y+=t q.a+=t/f if(q.y>f+3)q.y-=32*999 if g(-3,q.y,f+3)==q.y then u,v=m+60*cos(q.a),q.y ?"🐱",u-3,v-2,8 if(u==g(w-3,u,w+3)and g(z-2,v,z+2)==v)q.y-=32*999 s+=1 z=-6 if(u==g(x-6,u,x+6)and g(y-2,v,y+2)==v)goto s end end ?"|",w-2,z-2,12 ?"★",x-3,y-2,10 ?"s:"..s.."\nh:"..h,8,8,6 flip()goto _
